item.title: [RS2][0k][Â£0 GBP] FrostByte100\\\\\\\'s Free Scripts
item.dc:creator: @Do0mzy Do0mzy
item.description:
@Do0mzy wrote:

I fixed the gem buyer for you

[code]//–====Gem Buyer By frostbyte100====–
// This script is designed to buy
// cut and uncut gems in al kharid/falador store. This script
// will buy all the cut/uncut gems in the shop.
// Have A LOT of money with you. This script
// will also let you buy just one or several
// different types of gems. All you
// have to do is ADD/REMOVE the \" // \" in
// the script on lines 191-198. For More information about this
// read lines 14 and on.
//
//
//
// If would like it to juss buy BOTH diamonds and uncut sapphires
// you would remove the \" // \" from the diamond section and the sapphire section. Pretty
// simple if you use your brain.
//
// Start the script with the gem buying screen Open.

program GemBuyer;
var
amin,gamin,vamin,hamin:integer;
procedure BuyUsapphire;
begin
vamin := 50 + random (78);
wait (vamin)
Writeln(’\\Buying uncut sapphires…\’)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
MoveMouse(100,100)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(100,10,False)
Gamin := 100 + random (400);
wait(gamin);
MoveMouse(71,165)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(71,165,True)
Amin := 200 + random(500);
wait (amin);

end;

procedure BuyUemerald;
begin
vamin := 50 + random (78);
wait (vamin)
Writeln(’\\Buying uncut emeralds…\’)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
MoveMouse(150,100)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(150,100,False)
Gamin := 100 + random (400);
wait(gamin);
MoveMouse(121,165)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(121,165,True)
Amin := 200 + random(500);
wait (amin);
end;

procedure BuyUruby;
begin
vamin := 50 + random (78);
wait (vamin)
Writeln(’\\Buying uncut rubys…\’)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
MoveMouse(295,100)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(295,100,False)
Gamin := 100 + random (400);
wait(gamin);
MoveMouse(171,165)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(171,165,True)
Amin := 200 + random(500);
wait (amin);
end;
procedure BuyUdiamond;
begin
vamin := 50 + random (78);
wait (vamin)
Writeln(’\\Buying uncut diamonds…\’)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
MoveMouse(240,100)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(240,100,False)
Gamin := 100 + random (400);
wait(gamin);
MoveMouse(221,165)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(221,165,True)
Amin := 200 + random(500);
wait (amin);
end;
procedure BuyCsapphire;
begin
vamin := 50 + random (78);
wait (vamin)
Writeln(’\\Buying sapphires…\’)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
MoveMouse(300,100)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(300,100,False)
Gamin := 100 + random (400);
wait(gamin);
MoveMouse(271,165)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(271,165,True)
Amin := 200 + random(500);
wait (amin);
end;

procedure BuyCemerald;
begin
vamin := 50 + random (78);
wait (vamin)
Writeln(’\\Buying emeralds…\’)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
MoveMouse(330,100)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(330,100,False)
Gamin := 100 + random (400);
wait(gamin);
MoveMouse(321,165)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(321,165,True)
Amin := 200 + random(500);
wait (amin);
end;
procedure BuyCruby;
begin
vamin := 50 + random (78);
wait (vamin)
Writeln(’\\Buying rubys…\’)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
MoveMouse(380,100)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(380,100,False)
Gamin := 100 + random (400);
wait(gamin);
MoveMouse(371,165)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(371,165,True)
Amin := 200 + random(500);
wait (amin);
end;
procedure BuyCdiamond;
begin
vamin := 50 + random (78);
wait (vamin)
Writeln(’\\Buying diamonds…\’)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
MoveMouse(430,100)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(450,100,False)
Gamin := 100 + random (400);
wait(gamin);
MoveMouse(421,165)
Hamin := 50 + random(70);
wait(hamin);
ClickMouse(421,165,True)
Amin := 200 + random(500);
wait (amin);
end;
begin
// U= uncut C= cut
repeat

BuyUsapphire;
//BuyUemerald;
//BuyUruby;
//BuyUdiamond;
//BuyCsapphire;
//BuyCemerald;
//BuyCruby;
//BuyCdiamond
Until(false);
end.
program New;
begin
end.[/code]
